name: R41X - Prologue
description:
Paul is a researcher in charge of R41X, an artificial intelligence.

Discover what happens when he tries to interact with it in this short visual novel.

Controls

In menus

- Up Down Left Right / W S A D: movement, change options

- Enter:  accept

- Escape: go back

During gameplay

- Escape: quit

- Up Down / W S: select option

- Enter: continue, accept

- Space: fast-forward
